channel.title: Denny Nguyen's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content on Denny Nguyen's Github Site

item.title: NCAA follow up: me and my cardbox house
item.description: So. I bet everything I owned on the NCAA tournament based on what my model told me and I am now homeless. The Colgate-Iowa final did not happen. But while I did lose everything, I learned some valuable lessons. The most surprising thing about this whole process was that I was somehow not last. I know what you’re thinking, “you picked Colgate-Iowa for your final and you still didn’t get last?

item.title: How I would've lost all of my money if I bet on the NCAA bracket (with machine learning)
item.description: The greatest thing about my current job is that it does not allow me to bet money on college sports. If I were able to bet on March Madness, I would be in serious debt. I don’t claim to be a basketball genius, but I certainly wouldn’t say that I have no idea what I’m doing when filling out an NCAA Tournament bracket. When I’m picking my teams, I can back up my picks with solid reasoning.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
